data.title: Europol shuts down dark web marketplace selling fentanyl and weapons
data.snippet: Operation SpecTor results in 288 arrests and seizure of $55 million in cryptocurrency from the largest dark web marketplace for illegal goods.

data.title: Social media platforms struggle to contain illegal wildlife trade
data.snippet: Despite platform policies, researchers find thousands of active listings for endangered species parts on Facebook, Instagram, and Telegram.

data.title: India customs seizes record quantity of illegal drugs ordered through encrypted apps
data.snippet: Mumbai and Delhi customs report a 200% increase in drug seizures linked to orders placed through encrypted messaging platforms.

data.title: Amazon and eBay remove thousands of listings for banned pesticides and chemicals
data.snippet: An investigation reveals controlled substances and banned chemicals being openly sold on major e-commerce platforms with minimal verification.

data.title: Telegram channels selling counterfeit pharmaceuticals reach millions of users
data.snippet: Investigative reporting uncovers networks of Telegram channels selling fake medications including antibiotics, opioids, and cancer drugs.
